item.title: SCORM Video Development - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to assist in developing 3 videos in SCORM format. The videos will be used for an e-learning platform and should be engaging and interactive. The ideal candidate should have experience in SCORM development and a strong understanding of instructional design principles.

Key responsibilities include:
- Collaborate with our team to define video objectives and content
- Create storyboard concepts and scripts for the videos
- Develop and edit video content using SCORM authoring tools
- Implement interactive elements and assessments within the videos
- Ensure videos are SCORM compliant and work seamlessly on various platforms

Skills required:
- SCORM development
- Instructional design
- Video editing
- Storyboarding
- Creativity and attention to detail

This is a medium-sized project, with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level expert who can deliver high-quality SCORM videos within the given timeframe.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 29, 2024 19:07 UTC
Category: Instructional Design
Skills:Animation, Elearning, Video Editing, Education, Video Production
Skills: Animation, Elearning, Video Editing, Education, Video Production
Country: Saudi Arabia
click to apply

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BNQ9Z1Bjwes

If you can handle at least 5 videos per day OR you have a team that can. Please send me a message to start today.

Video lenght: around 20min (including interview/reaction clips). Price 10$. Price per day 50$ per 5 scripts. 350$ per week. 1400$ per month.

***[IMPORTANT] Please attach previous scripts done by you or your team. If not, your offer WON'T be read.

Category: Creative Writing
